explanation: [0-0] A man lies on the white ground with his eyes closed, frowning in pain. His head is wrapped in a bandage with red bloodstains, and a red string is tied around his right wrist. The man has short brown hair and wears a white vest. Two black flowerpots and a red flowerpot with different green plants are placed on his left, and some metal equipment is piled up against the white wall.

[0-7] Then the man squeezes a red blood bag with both hands, splattering red liquid around his mouth, neck, hands, chest, and the ground. After the blood bag bursts, the man turns his head to the right, with both hands on his sides. Subsequently, he opens his eyes, raises his left shoulder, and his right hand trembles constantly.

[7-14] He then raises his head, opens his eyes wide with a painful expression, and red liquid sprays from his mouth. His head shakes a few times before he falls back to the ground. A small amount of red liquid spurts out again. Finally, he closes his eyes and turns his head to the right.
